revised_title: Enzyme Function and Localization in Cells: Morphology and Organization of Enzymatic Systems in Cytoplasm
tldr: The author discusses the function and location of enzymes in cells, focusing on cell morphology and the organization of enzymatic systems in the cytoplasm. They describe the method of differential centrifugation, which allows for the separation and analysis of various cellular components, providing insights into the composition and localization of biochemical functions within cells.
